title: Takbir Black Stone
description: Authentic supplications for Takbir Black Stone
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Takbir Black Stone. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 234
items.arabic: ((طَافَ النَّبيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم بِالْبَيْتِ عَلَى بَعِيرٍ كُلَّمَا أَتَى الرُّكْنَ أَشَارَ إِلَيْهِ بِشَيْءٍ عِنْدَهُ وَكَبَّرَ)).
items.transliteration: The Prophet  circled the KaAAbah on a camel, every time he reached the black stone he would point to it with his staff and say: (Allahu akbar)
items.translation: The Prophet  circled the KaAAbah on a camel, every time he reached the black stone he would point to it with his staff and say: (Allah is the greatest)

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: التكبير عند الحجر الأسود
